mapper.select: SELECT MAI_ANICODE, MAC_ANICLSCODE, MAC_NAME, MAC_ENAME, MAC_SNAME, MVI_VVRMNAME,fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))/12) AS AGE, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 ) * 12 as AGE2, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','205',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_RANK, MAC_NATMON FROM MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MVI_VVRMNO = MAI_VVRMNO AND MAI_ANICODE = #{MAI_ANICODE} AND MF_ANI_INFO.CMN_DEL_STS='N'
